dmca.title: travelsalaska.com
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Scott Correy [mailto:scorrey@alaskatia.org] 
Sent: Monday, June 20, 2005 12:56 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: FW: travelsalaska.com


The owner of travelsalaska.com which is hosted by you has been copying the
websites of our members in their entirety and publishing these copies with
changes only to the email addresses to make it appear that these are the
legitimate business sites of our members , which they are not, in order to
mislead customers. A prime example is if you compare his site as it exists
currently to:
 
http://www.homeshore.com/
 
The owner of travelsalaska.com is clearly  in  violation of  your AUP  as
far as I can tell.
This is the third instance of this that we have seen as he changes his site
every few weeks. Please contact me via phone or email ASAP with any
questions you may have.
 

                Scott Correy

                Communications Technology Coordinator 

                Alaska Travel Industry Association

                (907)646-3316
